plugin.name: mg_status
plugin.author: Viktor Kratz
plugin.purpose: Prints current hp/sp/poison status to status line, later it can be used to request information.

muclient.script: mg_char_id="267745b27b2f0e42200da929" function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, data) if id == mg_char_id and msg==1 then hp=GetPluginVariable(mg_char_id,"hp") sp=GetPluginVariable(mg_char_id,"sp") SetStatus(hp .. " " .. sp) end -- if end -- OnPluginBroadcast
